entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
